alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 12 at 10:53AM MST until January 12 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning is in effect for likely sustained winds greater than 40 mph with wind gusts greater than 58 mph. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range
